name: Mother Tree (Algebro, La Personaje, SamElOcurrente)
description:
A Tower Defence game, set around a huge tree and its roots, which are being harassed by an anthropomorphic rat civilisation called "the rattys".

Collect 'power seeds' by defeating enemies and invest them in defence towers to protect the roots of the mother tree.

All waves are natural perfect roots amount of creatures!

Game made by:

ALGEBRO - Programmer and Game Designer.  (SeeMore)

LAPERSONAJE - Art.  (SeeMore)

SAMELOCURRENTE - Sound Designer and Composer.   (SeeMore)
